Address.label: Address
Address.value: UNIT 609, 6/F, NAN FUNG COMMERCIAL CENTRE,NO.19 LAM LOK STREET, KOWLOON BAY, 999077, Hong Kong

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Raytech Holdings Company Limited, founded in 1993 (its subsidiary company, Pure Beauty Manufacturing Company Limited, established in 2013) is one of electronic personal care and household appliances manufacturers in Hong Kong. With over 20 years of operating history and industry experiences, we are principally engaged in product designing and manufacturing of various product ranges such as Hair Care, Men's Care and Women's Care products. Our production facilities are located in Zhongshan, Guangdong Province, China. We are certified under ISO9001, ISO14001, BSCI and other relative certificates to each country.
